Body: I have a Moto G XT-1033  with Lollipop OS and with all browsers except Opera Mini. I get redirected to ads.adsmatte.com, then to youradexchange.com and then an ad to install Opera Mini and that my phone had been infected with a virus, etc.This happened soon after my Google search stopped working few days ago. Then suddenly it asked me to update Java and automatically downloaded the setup file which I was unable to stop. I deleted the file as soon as the download was completed. If I disable JavaScript on Chrome, then the ads don't appear.What can I do to permanently solve this problem? Avast and MalwareBytes haven't detected anything.
Title: Removing AdsMatte and YourAdExchange popups

history.Text: I have a moto g xt 1033  with lollipop os and with all browsers except opera mini I get redirected to ads.adsmatte.com, then to youradexchange.com and then an ad to install opera mini and that my phone had been infected with a virus etc..This happened soon after my Google search stopped working few days ago. then suddenly it asked me to update java and automatically downloaded the setup file which I was unable to stop. I deleted the file as soon as the download was completed. If I disable JavaScript on chrome, then the ads don't appear.What can I do to permanently solve this problem? Avast and malwarebytes haven't detected anything.
